clean.title: Clean Wallet
clean.toolTips: Token Balance at Chainlink Market Price with 30% discount. This fee is high right now. It will come during the next app release.

faq.title: FAQs
faq.title1: What tokens are supported and not supported?
faq.des1: Currently, the app only supports any token with a Chainlink price feed. We‚Äôre planning to broaden token support significantly in version 2.
faq.des2: Each token is priced based on its Chainlink price feed with a Taker Discount, so they can cover gas costs, and a Protocol Fee for using the service. The Taker Discount and Protocol Fee are dynamic so check our Discord for the latest numbers. We are working hard to bring these numbers down close to zero of time.
faq.title3: Is Dustsweeper available on other chains?
faq.des3: Dustsweeper is only deployed to Ethereum mainnet at the moment. If you‚Äôd like to use the app on another chain, please request it here.
faq.title4: How do I learn more about the DustSweeper project?
faq.des4: Join our Discord, follow us on Twitter, or read the original write-up on Mirror.
